lib
Class TextGlyph

java.lang.Object
  lib.TextChunk
      lib.TextGlyph
All Implemented Interfaces:
Text
public class TextGlyph
extends TextChunk
implements Text

this is an extension to TextChunk which draws Drawable objects instead of text. each "glyph" has an associated text string, whose size determines the amount of horizontal space the glyph will occupy. The glyphs have an additional set of scales and offsets which can be adjusted to fit them into text lines.

Author:
Ddyer

create

public static TextGlyph create(java.lang.String str,
                               Drawable art,
                               exCanvas can,
                               double... scl)
Create a glyph object

Parameters:
str - the text which reserves space for the glyph
art - the StockArt that becomes the glyph
can - the canvas (viewer) where the glyph will be drawn
scl - an array of scale factors, with up to 4 elements: linesize multiplier, width multiplier, x-offset, y-offset
Returns:
a Text object

create

public static TextGlyph create(java.lang.String str,
                               java.lang.String replacement,
                               Drawable art,
                               exCanvas can,
                               double... scl)
Create a glyph object which is intended to replace text using colorize.

Parameters:
str - the match string
replacement - the replacement string (for sizing purposes)
art - the glyph
can - the canvas
scl - the scaling info
Returns:
a new Text object

Parameters:

visible - the visible text
art - the stockart to be presented
can - the canvas
